thread.title: Five-member gang and proclaimed offender taken into custody: Karachi Police
thread.title_full: Five-member gang and proclaimed offender taken into custody: Karachi Police

title: Five-member gang and proclaimed offender taken into custody: Karachi Police
text:
0 File photo 
KARACHI: At least six suspects were taken into custody, including a proclaimed offender, by Karachi police after raids conducted in different areas of the metropolis in the wee hours of Tuesday.According to details provided by Police, in a raid conducted in Korangi, an alleged five-member dacoit gang was apprehended. The detained suspects included two men who are involved in the assassination of a police officer.Police added that weapon and stolen goods were recovered from the suspects. Meanwhile, in an another raid at PIB Colony, a proclaimed offender was apprehended by Police. The authorities claim that Faheem was involved in a number of criminal activities witnessed in the metropolis. 0 0 Five-member gang and proclaimed offender taken into custody: Karachi Police was posted in pakistan   , Geo News, Geo Tv, Karachi, Korangi, Latest News Pakistan, Pakistan, Pakistan News, Proclaimed Killer, Shooting.   "Five-member gang and proclaimed offender taken into custody: Karachi Police" is https://www.geo.tv/latest/127597-Five-member-gang-and-proclaimed-offender-taken-into-custody-Karachi-Police .
